mapper.select:
select
from t_wh_odo_line where id = #{id} and ou_id =#{ouId}

mapper.sql: line.id as id, line.odo_id as odoId, line.linenum as linenum, line.original_linenum as originalLinenum, line.store_id as storeId, line.ext_linenum as extLinenum, line.sku_id as skuId, line.sku_bar_code as skuBarCode, line.sku_name as skuName, line.ext_sku_name as extSkuName, line.qty as qty, line.plan_qty as planQty, line.current_qty as currentQty, line.actual_qty as actualQty, line.cancel_qty as cancelQty, line.assign_qty as assignQty, line.dieking_qty as diekingQty, line.line_price as linePrice, line.line_amt as lineAmt, line.odo_line_status as odoLineStatus, line.is_check as isCheck, line.full_line_outbound as fullLineOutbound, line.part_outbound_strategy as partOutboundStrategy, line.mfg_date as mfgDate, line.exp_date as expDate, line.min_exp_date as minExpDate, line.max_exp_date as maxExpDate, line.batch_number as batchNumber, line.country_of_origin as countryOfOrigin, line.inv_status as invStatus, line.inv_type as invType, line.inv_attr1 as invAttr1, line.inv_attr2 as invAttr2, line.inv_attr3 as invAttr3, line.inv_attr4 as invAttr4, line.inv_attr5 as invAttr5, line.outbound_carton_type as outboundCartonType, line.color as color, line.style as style, line.size as size, line.mixing_attr as mixingAttr, line.original_odo_code as originalOdoCode, line.assign_fail_reason as assignFailReason, line.is_assign_success as isAssignSuccess, line.ou_id as ouId, line.create_time as createTime, line.created_id as createdId, line.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, line.modified_id as modifiedId, line.wave_code as waveCode
mapper.update: update t_wh_odo_line l set l.is_assign_success = 0, l.assign_fail_reason = #{reason}, l.odo_line_status = 1, l.wave_code = null where l.odo_id = #{odoId} and l.ou_id = #{ouId}
update t_wh_odo_line l set l.assign_qty = 0.0 where l.odo_id = #{odoId} and l.ou_id = #{ouId}

update t_wh_odo_line set odo_line_status = #{status}, wave_code=#{waveCode}, last_modify_time=now(), modified_id=#{userId}, assign_fail_reason=null, is_assign_success=null where ou_id=#{ouId} and odo_id in
#{odoId}

UPDATE t_wh_odo_line SET modified_id = #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT}, odo_line_status = #{odoLineStatus,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE odo_id = #{odoId} and ou_id=#{ouId}
mapper.sql: odoline.id as id, odoline.odo_id as odoId, odoline.linenum as linenum, odoline.original_linenum as originalLinenum, odoline.store_id as storeId, odoline.ext_linenum as extLinenum, odoline.sku_id as skuId, odoline.sku_bar_code as skuBarCode, odoline.sku_name as skuName, odoline.ext_sku_name as extSkuName, odoline.qty as qty, odoline.plan_qty as planQty, odoline.current_qty as currentQty, odoline.actual_qty as actualQty, odoline.cancel_qty as cancelQty, odoline.assign_qty as assignQty, odoline.dieking_qty as diekingQty, odoline.line_price as linePrice, odoline.line_amt as lineAmt, odoline.odo_line_status as odoLineStatus, odoline.is_check as isCheck, odoline.full_line_outbound as fullLineOutbound, odoline.part_outbound_strategy as partOutboundStrategy, odoline.mfg_date as mfgDate, odoline.exp_date as expDate, odoline.min_exp_date as minExpDate, odoline.max_exp_date as maxExpDate, odoline.batch_number as batchNumber, odoline.country_of_origin as countryOfOrigin, odoline.inv_status as invStatus, odoline.inv_type as invType, odoline.inv_attr1 as invAttr1, odoline.inv_attr2 as invAttr2, odoline.inv_attr3 as invAttr3, odoline.inv_attr4 as invAttr4, odoline.inv_attr5 as invAttr5, odoline.outbound_carton_type as outboundCartonType, odoline.color as color, odoline.style as style, odoline.size as size, odoline.mixing_attr as mixingAttr, odoline.original_odo_code as originalOdoCode, odoline.assign_fail_reason as assignFailReason, odoline.is_assign_success as isAssignSuccess, odoline.ou_id as ouId, odoline.create_time as createTime, odoline.created_id as createdId, odoline.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, odoline.modified_id as modifiedId, odoline.wave_code as waveCode, odo.odo_code as odoCode, odo.priority_level as priorityLevel, mgmt.plan_deliver_goods_time as planDeliverGoodsTime, odo.order_time as orderTime, odo.store_id as storeId
mapper.select: select l.sku_id from t_wh_odo_line l where l.odo_id = #{odoId} and l.ou_id = #{ouId} group by sku_id

select count(1) from t_wh_odo_line odoline where odoline.odo_id=#{odoId} and odoLine.ou_id=#{ouId} and ( odoline.outbound_carton_type is not null or odoline.inv_status!=3 or IFNULL(odoline.mixing_attr,'')!='' or IFNULL(concat_ws(odoline.inv_type, odoline.inv_attr1, odoline.inv_attr2, odoline.inv_attr3, odoline.inv_attr5, odoline.inv_attr5, odoline.batch_number, odoline.mfg_date, odoline.exp_date, odoline.country_of_origin ),'')!='' )
